document_data.caption: The head of a Stygian arrow.
document_data.name: ''Stygian Arrow''
document_data.mainbody: ygian arrows could be shot from standard [[bow]]s. When they hit a surface, they created a zone of ''[[darkness]]''.
document_data.Description: Stygian arrows could be shot from standard [[bow]]s. When they hit a surface, they created a zone of ''[[darkness]]''.
document_data.History: Such arrows were known to be found around the [[Western Heartlands]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Arron]], a [[Lightfoot halfling]] [[druid]] trader from the [[Emerald Enclave]] in the 15{{th}} century DR.
* [[Barcus Wroot]], a [[deep gnome]] from the Western Heartlands in the 15{{th}} century DR.
* [[Dammon]], a [[tiefling]] refugee blacksmith from the city of [[Elturel]] in the 15{{th}} century DR.
* [[Mari (looter)|Mari]], a looter from the Western Heartlands in the 15{{th}} century DR.
* [[Roah Moonglow]], a hin agent of the [[Zhentarim]] who did business with the [[Cult of the Absolute]] in the 15{{th}} century DR.
* [[Talli]], a [[Harper]] quartermaster who followed [[Jaheira]] into the [[Shadow-cursed Lands]] in the 15{{th}} century DR.
